mapper.select: select c.ST_COURSE_ID,c.COURSE_ID from ${jdbc.schema}.tb_course_st c left join ${jdbc.schema}.tb_roaster_jx r on c.COURSE_ID=r.COURSE_ID where r.START_TIME > date(#{bookingDate}) and r.START_TIME < date_add(date(#{bookingDate}), interval 1 day) and c.STUDENT_ID = #{getDayBookNum} and c.COURSE_STAT != 'YQX'
